title: Buff/Rework teemo 2014
body:
He is literally the trashiest champion in the game atm, even Urgot is better, what am I saying? Urgot is fine. 
Like teemo is just so bad that he isn't even viable as a solo top in ranked solo queue. 
Please buff/rework teemo so I can play this cute little fury fluffy adorable baby joey. I love him for his cuteness + tactical play, and I want to be able to use him in ranked :'(

replies.body:
teemo is really strong...

its just he doesnt exactly fit the meta. infact he counters the meta...since the meta is shifting again towards double ranged ADC. either with a top or mid ADC. teemo can go in both those lanes and deny them their faster power spikes compared to bot lane, or atleast slow them down a bit.

the only thing wrong with teemo is he lacks a true identity. he cant split push as well as others but he has a self safety net while split pushing. he cant team fight well with short range and a single target blind. and half of his kit isnt designed for teamfighting. furthermore his item build paths arent exactly intuitive of his design. killer assassin rat thing, on hit damage over time or exploding damage over time abilities/focal points of build paths.
building as an on hit gives no assassination power, so seemingly against his design ideal. building for massive nuke ults...luck based if anyone even goes over them, not exactly assassinations when you have no factor in the hit apart from placement. surprise invis assassinations based on people walking TO your point of hiding, 0 get in and get out potential, no escape like all other assassins.

Thanks for your analysis, but I don't see how he counters the meta.

Literally anyone can start mr quints + flask then begin to outscale teemo

Like Maokai vs Teemo for an example
Maokai farms from range with q and e, teemo uses blind to poke maokai, maokai waits for 2-3 seconds and starts last hitting again...
Even if teemo times his q right it doesn't change the fact that he gets outscaled really hard. 

Teemo vs any ap mid = teemo's q damage is negligible, e relies on you dealing sustained damage, most ap mids will just chunk teemos face when he goes in on them...

Teemo vs Nasus = Teemo is annoying for a bit but he is so squishy, Nasus w slow will most likely lead to teemos demise from a jg gank,  a good Nasus can easily win this matchup  through severe out-scaling it feels.  

Dealing with Teemo is like dealing with a weaker version of lane pantheon. 
Except lane pantheon can setup awesome skirmishes with R, and capitalize on enemies going deep.

im afraid you didnt even read my comment...

"since the meta is shifting again towards double ranged ADC. either with a top or mid ADC"

at current teemo is weak against the bruisers who dont care as much about teemo after a few MR items. but they still have to counter build him or he will be a massive pain during the early game. and then all his scaling goes into shrooming with 40% CDR and liandries burn.
but the main point i was trying to make is that the meta is shifting. to ranged ADCs in top and mid lanes. because they are a strong counter to those big bruisers, purely from the fact that they "pantheon" the laning phase against most of those bruisers, and they also outscale.

you basically just said all the current match ups that put teemo under. but ranged ADCs and basically every melee ADC that cant just easily transition into a bruiser, teemo does extremely well against.
so, he counters a future iteration of the meta. if the meta actually GETS to that point where 2ndary ADCs become common place.

either way, teemo is strong where teemo is strong, and weak where teemo is weak....exactly the place riot wants EVERY champ...so why does he need to be changed?

So what? Teemo the ranged apc top lane is as useful as Jayce? You have got to be kidding, Jayce has such a versatile kit. 
Jayce can give his entire team a talisman of ascension, he gets ms after changing stances, combined with all this ms a q to gap close, endless poke, decent 1v1 potential once he gets his 4th-5th item + isn't nearly as vulnerable as teemo, all Teemo provides is a q aa blind mechanic which requires him to get in dangerously close, some nice shrooms to catch off enemies, then sustained dps/chase potential with e and w. 

Early game: his weakest point but actually isn't that weak if you know how to play it
mid game: decent poke, seems to win a lot of exchanges with (ranged) q > e > r > q > e 
late game: murmana/arpen/crit = blows up squishies + pretty decent siege + deletes towers like Nasus

so....teemo is bad because 1 over powered over loaded champ is stronger?
you really have no idea why you are complaining about teemo anymore do you?

teemo is in a good spot and doesnt need changes, simple as that. any buffs would be short sighted and completely stupid. 
re-balancing his kit would be 1 option, but as i said before, he has 2 distinct identities that both fall a little short of other champs. and focusing on one would remove the other, which would hinder 50% of teemo players, as not everyone plays teemo 1 way or the 1 way rito would choose to focus on.

tl:dr of this whole thread; there is nothing wrong with teemo except his identity. overall one of the most balanced champs in the game.
Buff Teemo? You do understand that everyone in Bronze will unistall the game?
mate if Singed can gets buffs and bronzies still survive, so can Teemo!
He's not trash at all, I agree he may need a mini rework but he is no where near urgot level
